name: Put In Ball
description:
Put In ball made for GameZanga  jam 10th 

Theme: One time use

You should put the ball in the basket by one hit with the head of the player if the ball turn to red color don't touch it you'll die.
Use Arrow key to move of AD key and space to jump .

Have fun.

sounds ==>  freesound.org

Font ==> https://www.dafont.com/endgame.font
